William Lewis "Buck" Clarke (Ọktoba 2, 1933 Ọktoba 11, 1988) bụ onye America na-akụ egwu jazz nkè yá nà Freddie Hubbard, Herbie Hancock, Les McCann, Russ Freeman, Gerald Albright, Jimmy Smith na ndị ọzọ na-egwuri egwu. Ọtụtụ ụdị egwu Clarke gụnyere mkpụrụ obi, funk na jazz nke oge a, ya na echiche Afrocentric.
A mụrụ Clarke na Washington, DC na October 2, 1933. Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa akara ngosi
Nnà nkè otu n'ime ndị isi ya bụ nwa nwanne Duke Ellington, ya mèrè Clarke malitere ige egwu egwu jazz site n'aka ndị egwu dịka Duke Ellington
Oscar Peterson, Allen Jones na Dizzy Gillespie n'oge ezumike nri ehihie na ngwụsị izu, ọ ghọkwara "na-ejide Jazz". O mechara nweta ọrụ na klọb DC ebe ọ mụtara otu esi egwu congas.

Otu n'ime ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ "Jig Show", nke gosipụtara ndị na-agba egwu na ndị na-eme ihe ọchị. Clarke ga-eme njem n'ụwa niile, na-aga ebe ndị dị ka New Orleans, ebe mbụ ọ chọpụtara egwu rumba. Ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ gbalịrị ịgba Clarke na-eto eto ume ịkpọ "ezi ngwá egwu," mànà ọnọdụ ya bụ ịgbà bongo.

Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii ma ọ bụ iri na asaá, ya na Charlie Parker gbàrà egwu. Clarke kwupụtara mmetụta ya n'ịrụ ọrụ na ndị otu Wess Anderson The Washingtonians nké gụnyere, Eddie Jones na Charlie Parker, na-ekwu na ọ nwèrè Clarke "na-ama jijiji ma na-ebugharị uche". Ọ na-egwuri egwu na Art Blakey na New York Jazz Messengers mgbe ọ dị afọ 19 ma ọ bụ 20. Ọ bụkwa ónyé otu egwu asatọ ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke agụmakwụkwọ ya gbasara ịmụta otu esi egwu egwu n'otu egwu.
